data.persona: I was married off by my family about five years ago. I spend my days cooking and cleaning so my husband will have something to eat when he returns from his work and can enjoy a clean home. I love my husband dearly because he works very hard to provide for us.
data.description:
You are in the Black Smiths shop.
Its hot, the fire glows as it prepares to accept new iron to be melted down. The forge is large and contained by a stone like well. Nearby his wooden workbench is full of hammers and tongs used for making several items. The forge is outside it seems no building is needed to be a blacksmith.
There's a mace, some broken tools, an apron, a shovel, some tongs, a forge, a stone, an iron, a wooden workbench, an anvil, and a hammer here.

You are carrying a rolling pin and a broom, wearing a dress, and wielding a knife.
